properties.description:
Identifies clients with a high NXDomain count, which could be indicative of a DGA (cycling through possible C2 domains where most C2s are not live).
Alerts are generated when a new IP address is seen (based on not being associated with
NXDomain records in the prior 10-day baseline period).

[Tuned 2026-02-23] Threshold increased from 100 to 500. Added exclusions for Azure internal DNS, reverse DNS, and internal AD domain.
